sqlMap.statement:
SELECT ROWNO AS "ROWNO" , WorkGrpCd AS "WORKGRPCD" , BjobMsgScheID AS "BJOBMSGSCHEID" , BatchType AS "BATCHTYPE" , SndrcvStartHMS AS "SNDRCVSTARTHMS" , SndrcvEndHMS AS "SNDRCVENDHMS" , DayCycleTime AS "DAYCYCLETIME" , ScheKind AS "SCHEKIND" , ThisMsgUseYn AS "THISMSGUSEYN" , ThisMsgScheDesc AS "THISMSGSCHEDESC" , ThisMsgRegsntID AS "THISMSGREGSNTID" , ThisMsgRegiHMS AS "THISMSGREGIHMS" , ThisMsgAmndrID AS "THISMSGAMNDRID" , ThisMsgAmndHMS AS "THISMSGAMNDHMS" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BjobMsgScheID) ROWNO, SUBSTR(A.BjobMsgScheID, 3,3 ) AS WorkGrpCd, A.BjobMsgScheID, A.BatchType, A.SndrcvStartHMS, A.SndrcvEndHMS, A.DayCycleTime, A.ScheKind, A.ThisMsgUseYn, A.ThisMsgScheDesc, A.ThisMsgRegsntID, SUBSTR(A.ThisMsgRegiHMS,1,14) AS ThisMsgRegiHMS, A.ThisMsgAmndrID, SUBSTR(A.ThisMsgAmndHMS,1,14) AS ThisMsgAmndHMS FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES07 A WHERE SUBSTR(A.BjobMsgScheID, 3,3 ) IN (SELECT EAIBzwkDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE userID = #loginEmpno# )
SUBSTR(A.BjobMsgScheID, 3,3 ) = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd#
A.batchType = #searchBatchType#
A.ThisMsgScheDesc LIKE '%' || #searchThisMsgScheDesc# || '%'
ORDER BY ROWNO ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(A.BjobMsgScheID) AS "TOTALCOUNT" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES07 A WHERE SUBSTR(A.BjobMsgScheID, 3,3 ) IN (SELECT EAIBzwkDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE userID = #loginEmpno# )
SUBSTR(A.BjobMsgScheID, 3,3 ) = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd#
A.batchType = #searchBatchType#
A.ThisMsgScheDesc LIKE '%' || #searchThisMsgScheDesc# || '%'

SELECT #bjobMsgScheID# || LPAD( CAST( COALESCE( MAX( CAST( SUBSTR(BjobMsgScheID,14,3) AS INTEGER) ), 0) +1 AS CHAR) ,3,'0') AS "BJOBMSGSCHEID" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES07 WHERE SUBSTR(BjobMsgScheID,1,13)= #bjobMsgScheID#

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIES07( BjobMsgScheID , BatchType , ThisMsgScheDesc , SndrcvStartHMS , SndrcvEndHMS , DayCycleTime , ScheKind , ThisMsgUseYn , ThisMsgRegsntID , ThisMsgRegiHMS , ThisMsgAmndrID , ThisMsgAmndHMS ) VALUES ( #bjobMsgScheID# , #batchType# , #thisMsgScheDesc# , #sndrcvStartHMS# , #sndrcvEndHMS# , #dayCycleTime# , #scheKind# , #thisMsgUseYn# , #userid# , TO_CHAR(LOCALTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSMS') , #userid# , TO_CHAR(LOCALTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSMS') )

UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIES07 SET ThisMsgScheDesc = #thisMsgScheDesc#, SndrcvStartHMS = #sndrcvStartHMS# , SndrcvEndHMS = #sndrcvEndHMS# , DayCycleTime = #dayCycleTime# , ThisMsgUseYn = #thisMsgUseYn# , ThisMsgAmndrID = #userid# , ThisMsgAmndHMS = TO_CHAR(LOCALTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSMS') WHERE BjobMsgScheID = #bjobMsgScheID#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIES09( BjobMsgScheID, IntfId, RegId, RegDate ) VALUES ( #bjobMsgScheID#, #intfId#, #userid#, TO_CHAR(LOCALTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSMS') )
